Address.label: Address
Address.value: 280 HANXI ROAD,BUILDING A3, E-PARK, GUANGZHOU, 511446, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: HUYA Inc is a technology-driven content company with game live streaming as its core business and is focused on building a live broadcast platform. Its products include live broadcast platform Huya Live, and Nimo TV, a popular game live broadcast platform in Southeast Asia and South America.

value.name: Jun Hong Huang
value.title: Co-Chief Executive Officer, Director & Senior VP
